entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamloops
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kamloops Airport 8:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:35 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
